key_talking_points: Penalty on Edmonton's Evander Kane for high-sticking Carter Verhaeghe. Florida goes to the power play for 2 minutes at 19:23 remaining in the first period.
This is a crucial power play for Florida to extend their one-goal lead early in the game.  Edmonton needs to kill this penalty to avoid falling further behind.
Keep an eye on Connor McDavid's ice time, as Edmonton will likely rely on him heavily to generate shorthanded opportunities.
for_commentary_agent.context: A penalty was just called on Edmonton, giving Florida a power play in a close, high-scoring game. This is a key moment but doesn't require immediate play-by-play yet.

high_intensity_events.summary: Hit by K. Kapanen (home) on A. Ekblad (away)
Penalty on E. Kane (home) for high-sticking C. Verhaeghe (away)

task_details.specific_guidance: Transition into discussing the implications of the upcoming Florida power play. Note key players on both sides and the impact on the score.
